extendedInfo.description: Bracket Tracker for March Madness.  Following both the men's and women's NCAA college basketball tournaments.  Keep track of your brackets.  Create pools and compete against your friends.Features:* Men's NCAA basketball tournament* Women's NCAA basketball tournament* Create Brackets* Zoom in and out in the bracket view* Current game time and scores appear on the results bracket* Create and run your own pools* Speculate, fill out the remaining results and see how it affects your pool* Different layouts for tablets and phones* A web interface is available at http://bracket-tracker.com/Any bracket entered in a pool is locked when the tournament starts.  Make sure you've completed your picks by Thursday.Pools created after the tournaments starts are unofficial. Users will be able to join them but there's no protection against a users changing his bracket like there is for pools created before the tournament started.Changelog3.2.0:Added the ability to speculate,  fill out the remaining results and see how it affects your pool.3.1.0:Add an option to graph the pool standings. This shows the pool standings by round for each round of the tournament.3.0.11:Auto-update game times and scores when returning to BracketTracker after the device has been off or in another app for more than 1 minute.3.0.10:Fix a crash if there was a problem communicating with the server.Fix a crash when attempting the leave the pool player list before it's finished loading.3.0.9:Completed brackets now open in a view only mode to prevent accidental modification. Press the edit button to allow changes.3.0.8:The size of team names increases as you zoom in.Allow zooming in farther than before.Restored the background of the champion, I accidentally removed it with the last update.3.0.7:Highlight games that are in progress.Show full team names if there's enough space.  E.g. on tablets or when zoomed in.Fixed a crash when returning to BracketTracker from another application.3.0.6:Fixed a bug displaying scores.3.0.5:Finish support for live scores.Finish support for highlighting correct and incorrect picks.Show points and points possible for each bracket on the pool view.3.0.4:Crash fixes.  One of which triggers a crash anytime a device running 2.1 or 2.2 attempts to view a bracket.3.0.3:Added game times to the bracket view.Fixed a bug rotating the bracket view on phones.Minor layout tweaks.3.0.2:Allow zooming in the bracket view.Fix a possible crash resuming the app after it's been idle.3.0.1:Support for the women's tournament.

reviews.title: Very helpful to get the overview
reviews.comment: Completely appreciate being men\'s and women\'s basketball updates together. App has worked each time I\'ve needed it.  Very happy with this download.
reviews.author: Delaine Adkins

reviews.title: Go Illini!
reviews.comment: Good app and easy to use. It would be better if you could use the pool section to see current leaders by rounds. Overall a great app. Fix it to see leaders by rounds, it gets 5 stars easily!
reviews.author: M Roberts

reviews.title: good for scores
reviews.comment: Only thing I would change is downloading friends\'brackets somehow.
reviews.author: Ryan Smith

reviews.title: Too much updates
reviews.comment: Updates itself like every day. Enough.
reviews.author: DJ Ski

reviews.title: Almost there!
reviews.comment: One more thing to do to make it better, when users want to create a new bracket, have it to where the games are already set up to where they can predict who wins the next games
reviews.author: Brandon Lewis

reviews.title: Gotta have!!!!!
reviews.comment: Definetely useful for the older peeps in my office who prefer paper could use a tie breaker section tho

reviews.title: To sm
reviews.comment: To sm to see
